name: Metropolitan Tour 3-4 Hours
description:
Get to know two of Lima´s most touristic districts.

From the Miraflores main streets and seafront, to San Isidro´s most exclusive boulevards and parks. Don´t miss the chance to ride along Arequipa Avenue, one of the oldest and longest streets of Lima, and discovering ¨Huaca Pucllana¨, a pre Inca temple situated in the heart of Miraflores.
Take some fresh air in one of San Isidro´s nicest parks,¨Bosque Olivar¨, where you can enjoy biking through ancient olive trees and be able to appreciate the ancient colonial houses blended in with today´s modern architecture.
